title: Model
description: This schema defines the Model entity. Models are algorithms trained on data to find patterns or make predictions.

id.description: Unique identifier of a model instance.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies a model.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this model.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity.

description.description: Description of the model, what it is, and how to use it.

algorithm.description: Algorithm used to train the model.

dashboard.description: Performance Dashboard URL to track metric evolution.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

usageSummary.description: Latest usage information for this model.
